description: This header file declares functions related to the Transport Layer Security (TLS) Record Keeper Object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization functions, specific to the TLS implementation in a network security context.

methods.name: TlsCreateRecordKeeper
methods.description: Creates and returns a new TLS Record Keeper object using provided container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: TlsRkoCreate
methods.description: Initializes a new instance of the TLS Record Keeper object.

methods.name: TlsRkoRemove
methods.description: Removes and frees resources associated with the specified TLS Record Keeper instance.

methods.name: TlsRkoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the TLS Record Keeper instance.

methods.name: TlsRkoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the TLS Record Keeper object.
